mdRecord.dcterms:title: Howery-Gray Cemetery
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Located near the Blue Ridge Parkway, it is located adjacent to 1376 Graysville Rd. SE, just north of the driveway. The cemetery sits on a wooded rise just a few yards off the road but is difficult to see from the road. The top of the wrought iron fence is visible if you look closely. The cemetery is overgrown at this time. N37 00.220 W80 08.460
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
